name: Neon Logic
description: Develop the idea of logical puzzles such as Master mind or bulls and cows, take challenges of great difficulty, correctly allocate chances for bonuses and try to get them randomly through roulette. Battle against each other in real time, or ask someone you know to pick a number for you. For fans of the classics, there's a custom mode. The higher the difficulty and the quicker the number calculator, the more points you can earn and top the leaderboard.
